Email.subject: Do you recognize it?
Email.body:
Papa!
Look at these pictures! Do you know where it is? I think I would be happy there. Imagine all the people I would meet, the inspiration, the food, the art?
I want to leave this life in Mexico behind and go there. I'm not happy with Diego... Mamma was right,
Besos, Frida(Image_Ocean)(Image_Beach)
